channel.title: Softlayer_virtual_disk_image_software on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_virtual_disk_image_software on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image_Software record connects a computing instance’s virtual disk images with software records. This can be useful if a disk image is directly associated with software such as operating systems. seeAlso SoftLayer_Virtual_Disk_Image SoftLayer_Software_Description Local id The unique identifier of a virtual disk image to software relationship. Type: integer softwareDescriptionId The unique identifier of the software that a virtual disk image is associated with.
